byline.original: By ALEXIS MAINLAND and LIZ HERON

abstract: With the hashtag #SteveJobsLegacy, people on Twitter assessed the contributions of Steve Jobs to their own lives.
snippet: With the hashtag #SteveJobsLegacy, people on Twitter assessed the contributions of Steve Jobs to their own lives.
lead_paragraph: We asked our Twitter followers on @nytimes to discuss the impact of Steve Jobs' work using the hashtag #SteveJobsLegacy. Below is a selection of the response we received. Please continue to share your thoughts by tweeting to us at @nytimes using #SteveJobsLegacy.

headline.main: On Twitter, Reflecting on the Legacy of Steve Jobs
